title: Half Onion Storage and Freshness Check

items.name: Half onion (wrapped)
items.details: Lasts 7-10 days in the fridge when wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, beeswax wrap, or in an airtight container.

items.name: Peeled and chopped onion
items.details: Use within 5-7 days when stored in the fridge.

items.name: Storage location
items.details: Keep in the crisper drawer, away from foods that absorb odors.

items.name: Signs it's bad
items.details: Slimy or wet surface, mushy or soft spots, dark spots/mold/discoloration, strong sour or rotten smell, sprouting (not unsafe but flavor is fading).

items.name: Signs it's still good
items.details: Firm to the touch, mild onion smell, no visible mold or mush.

notes: Trust your nose and fingers - onions should not feel gross or smell rotten. When in doubt, throw it out.
